Name: Fantasma
About the game: Fantasma is a Co-op (1-4) Psychological Horror that pits players against the supernatural. Alone or as a team- Prepare Coordinate a loadout. Upgrade and purchase equipment to give your team the advantage Embark Travel to haunted sites and risk your life against increasingly rare and deadly apparitions Coordinate Work together to overcome team-based tasks Escape Find your way out while being hunted to turn a profit. Upgrade, re-equip and re-deploy
